name: Mysterica
description:
In the degital world of swords and magic, we will continue to have a tense battle.
It is necessary to actually shake the sword and cast the magic to draw a pattern.
casual online matching battle is the main content of this game.
As an added bonus, there is PvE endless endurance battle that can be done offline.

The attraction is magic, defense, sword attack, or a battle that requires quick judgment.
*It is not recommended for people who are prone to car sickness in VR or who have too small a room.

official discord server : https://discord.gg/x35QEK8
